title: IHG Adds A Second Holiday Inn Express Hotel in Mexico ChihuahuaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
IHG adds a second Holiday Inn Express Hotel in Mexico Chihuahua Published on : Tuesday, July 21, 2015
InterContinental Hotels Group (IHG), one of the world’s leading hotel companies, announces the opening of the new-build 132-room Holiday Inn Express & Suites Chihuahua Juventud hotel following a US$ 9 million investment by owner Tinga S.A. de C.V. The hotel joins three other IHG properties open in Chihuahua: the Holiday Inn Hotel & Suites Chihuahua, the Holiday Inn Express Chihuahua hotel, and the recently opened Staybridge Suites Chihuahua hotel.
Gerardo Murray, Regional Vice President of Distribution and Commercial Marketing, Mexico, Latin America and The Caribbean, IHG, said: “We are extremely excited to bring a new Holiday Inn Express hotel to Chihuahua with our wonderful partners Tinga, S.A. de C.V. IHG continues growing its brands in Mexico, and this Holiday Inn Express hotel, located in Juventud — the new, modern and trendy area of Chihuahua — offers both business and leisure travelers a smart choice.”
There are several booming industries in Chihuahua bringing business travel to the area, including aerospace, agribusiness, automotive, forestry and mining. Chihuahua is also a top destination for leisure travelers and adventure seekers visiting the Copper Canyon, Basaseachic National Park and the Archaeological Complex of Paquime, one of the most important pre-Hispanic legacies in northern Mexico.
The Holiday Inn Express brand is the smart choice for travelers seeking a hotel that will help them rest and go while staying productive, delivering exactly what they need and nothing they don’t. The more than 2,300 Holiday Inn Express hotels worldwide offer a simple and efficient stay through the uncomplicated yet personal service travelers expect from the brand.
The hotel features a 24-hour fitness center, guest laundry, an indoor pool and Jacuzzi, and two meeting rooms with capacity for up to 60 people. Guest rooms feature contemporary styling, comfortable queen, king-sized or two double beds, a sitting area with a lounge chair and an in-room coffee machine featuring complimentary Smart Roast 100% Arabica coffee. The hotel’s 21 suites are further equipped with a microwave, refrigerator and sofa.
The complimentary Desayuno Express bar features a full range of breakfast items, including a rotation of egg and meat selections, pastries, yogurt, fruit, coffee, juices, and regional dishes such as machaca–dried shredded beef with scrambled eggs.
The hotel is owned and managed by Tinga S.A. de C.V. It is located at Paseo Vistas Del Sol 6403, Fraccionamiento Comercial Vistas del Sol, near shopping, restaurants and entertainment and within the Juventud area. It is a short drive from both Saucito and Americas Industrial Parks, the Punto Alto corporate center, 20 minutes from General Roberto Fierro de Villalobos International Airport and 15 minutes from Expo Chihuahua Convention Center.
Source:- IHG
